Package it.polimi.se2019.model.cards

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.Weapon
  • public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the information needed to compute the use of a Weapon, used during an Attack.
